thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Trolls Donald Trump With a ‘U Up?’ Tweet During Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Trolls Donald Trump With a ‘U Up?’ Tweet During Oscars

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Jimmy Kimmel Trolls Donald Trump With a ‘U Up?’ Tweet During Oscars
text:
Jimmy Kimmel Trolls Donald Trump With a ‘U Up?’ Tweet During Oscars by Dana Eisenberg | 10:57   
More than two hours into the Oscars tonight, Jimmy Kimmel became concerned because so far President Donald Trump hasn’t Tweeted anything yet, despite some politically charged moments. Iranian director Asghar Farhadi boycotted the ceremony, but when he won he sent a powerful message , and Kimmel mentioned the President in his monologue . He decided that now would be a good time to poke him and see if he could get a response. 
Kimmel went with a classic- “U up?” Hey @realDonaldTrump u up? 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
And, he made sure to mention Meryl Streep . 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
Watch the segment above. 
[featured image via screen grab]
